imdb.plot outline: Australian of the Year and founder of the Choir of Hard Knocks, Jonathon Welch, believes that music can change lives. However, when enters Tarrengower Women's Prison claiming he can rehabilitate the inmates by creating a choir, Jonathon has his work cut out for him. Will his unique brand of offering hope through song work among the female prisoners?
imdb.title: Jailbirds
plot: Australian of the Year and founder of the Choir of Hard Knocks, Jonathon Welch, believes that music can change lives. However, when enters Tarrengower Women's Prison claiming he can rehabilitate the inmates by creating a choir, Jonathon has his work cut out for him. Will his unique brand of offering hope through song work among the female prisoners?::Renegade Films
